title: Shadcn Isn’t Just a Library Anymore… Here’s How to 10x Your UI
description:
Shadcn just changed how I build UI. With the shadcn ui MCP server and Cursor AI, this shadcn tutorial shows a powerful workflow for web development. Learn how to build, style, and scale your UI using shadcn tools and MCP automation.

LINKS
Repo Link: https://github.com/Jpisnice/shadcn-ui-mcp-server

In this full shadcn ui tutorial, you'll learn how to structure and customize stunning interfaces using the shadcn ui MCP server with Cursor. Whether you're building in React JS or working on a Next.j
